head.supplied: Town Clerks Office ¶ Town Hall St Kilda ¶ April 30th 1863 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ By direction of the Planting Committee of the Municipal Council of St Kilda I do myself the honor to inclose you a list of plants &...

div.p: Letter press copy book, St Kilda Municipal Council records, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Trans. 16.8.94. To proof.
citation
Town Clerks Office

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
By direction of the Planting Committee of the Municipal Council of St Kilda I do myself the honor to inclose you a list of plants &c
List not found. required for the Public Gardens which the Committee will thank you to reserve for them and to let them know on what day it will be convenient to you to send for them. I am at the same time directed to request that you will b so good as to order a few potted plants &c to be looked out for them as the Public Gardens of St Kilda are the only Public Gardens in the Colony not receiving Special Government Assistance which reflect any credit on the Management

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: P. S. The Planting Committee purpose to have the pleasure of calling on you on Wednesday next at 3 oclock p.m.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
